title: Pixel switched to grayscale on its own. Can not switch back with accessibility, developer options.
content:
I have tried to fix via Accessibility, Developer Options, and Wind Down.
No luck here.  When I switched grayscale on/off in Developer Options, not change to the screen.

I have turned phone on/off.
Is there a way to reboot the phone without total factory reset?

Thanks for your help.
